com.reallymany.trapgrid

Class OutbreakLocation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.reallymany.trapgrid.OutbreakLocation

  • public class OutbreakLocation
extends java.lang.Object
    Amazing OutbreakLocation class abstracts a release at a given location on the grid of a given number of flies having a given diffusion coefficient
    Author:
    bhall
